title: FS:T206 Cobb Bat off Polar Bear PSA 4/Speaker PSA 4

posts.post_title: FS:T206 Cobb Bat off Polar Bear PSA 4/Speaker PSA 4
posts.post_content:
Anyone asking whats the lowest I can take will be met with whats the most you can offer.

Thought would give b/s/t a try before sending off.  I have made only successful transactions with members on the board.   I would ask that the usual suspects refrain from posting comments on this thread just to comment or stir the pot.



Cobb PSA 4 Polar Bear  
Speaker PSA 4 sold
